resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107554</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107554</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206247</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating the Climate System: Precipitation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschen des Klima-Systems: 
Niederschlag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Investigation du système de climat : 
Précipitation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Investigando o sistema do clima: 
Precipitação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio del sistema di clima: Precipitazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα του συστήματος κλίματος: Πτώση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Investigar el sistema del clima: 
Precipitación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a 23-page educator's guide organized around three questions: How are rainfall rates measured? How is the intensity and distribution of rainfall determined? How can you study rain?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist die Anleitung eines Erziehers 23-page, die um 
drei Fragen organisiert wird: Wie werden Niederschlagkinetik 
gemessen? Wie wird die Intensität und die Verteilung des 
Niederschlags festgestellt? Wie können Sie Regen studieren?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est le guide d'un éducateur 23-page organisé 
autour de trois questions : Comment est-ce que des cadences de 
précipitations sont mesurées ? Comment l'intensité et la 
distribution des précipitations est-elle déterminée ? Comment
pouvez-vous étudier la pluie ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é a guia de um educador 23-page organizada em 
torno de três perguntas: Como as taxas do rainfall são 
medidas? Como a intensidade e a distribuição do rainfall são 
determinadas? Como pode você estudar a chuva?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è la guida dell'educatore 23-page organizzata 
intorno a tre domande: Come i tassi di pioggia sono misurati? 
Come l'intensità e la distribuzione di pioggia è determinata? 
Come potete studiare la pioggia?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ο οδηγός ενός 23-σελίδων εκπαιδευτικού που 
οργανώνεται γύρω από τρεις ερωτήσεις: Πώς τα ποσοστά 
βροχοπτώσεων μετριούνται; Πώς η ένταση και η διανομή των 
βροχοπτώσεων καθορίζονται; Πώς μπορείτε να μελετήσετε τη 
βροχή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es la guía de un educador 23-page ordenada 
alrededor de tres preguntas: ¿Cómo se miden las tarifas de la 
precipitación? ¿Cómo la intensidad y la distribución de la 
precipitación se determina? ¿Cómo puede usted estudiar la 
lluvia?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206247</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107554</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/investigating-the-climate-system-precipitation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
